item.title: Border Patrol Union Backs Bondi for AG
item.description: As her confirmation hearing for attorney general began Wednesday, Pam Bondi received an endorsement from the border patrol union.

item.title: Axios: Trump Builds $500M War Chest
item.description: Donald Trump being prevented from running again reportedly hasn't stopped the president-elect from stockpiling a large amount of money from donations.
